es: Mantén presionado {0} para bajar de plataformas.

en: Marks a target. All projectiles will aim towards it.
Throw a rope with a hook on it.
Summons a giant scythe that mows down things in front.
Shoots a ray that transforms user into the hit target.
Summons a raising column. Can step over it.
Burns all nearby enemies for a certain amount of time.
Shoot a giant laser that hits all enemies close.

Herbal mix with curative properties.
Heals 50HP.
es:
Mezcla herbal con propiedades curativas.
Recupera 50PV.
